title: Han Huo Huo in Levi's® Cool Jeans / Levi's® Keep Cool ?? -??
description:
This spring, Levi's® is launching COOLMAX® and a collective range of COOL JEANS, an innovative denim collection specifically constructed to combat sweltering hot weather. With Levi's® COOL JEANS, everyone, everywhere has the opportunity to wear denim and non-denim styles year-round, regardless of the temperature. 

Engineered for comfort and woven with specialized fibers that create a cooling effect, these looks help adjust the body's temperature to maintain comfort amidst the summer heat, to KEEP you COOL from inside out. Renowned Chinese fashion blogger Han Huo Huo(韓火火) expressed his belief and dedication in being true to himself, empowered by the Levi's® COOL JEANS.

asset.author: Levi's®
